title: Implement selective reference loading
description:
Restructure reference loading from monolithic to on-demand:

**Current problem:**
- 35 reference files (~16,000 lines) always in context
- Most sessions only need 10-20% of this content

**New structure:**

Create .claude/reference/INDEX.md (~30 lines):
- Topic-to-file mapping
- When-to-load guidance
- Quick reference for common needs

Reorganize into categories:
```
reference/
  INDEX.md (always loaded)
  shared-definitions.md (always loaded)
  core/
    task-management.md
    validation-gates.md
  tools/
    claude-4-guide.md
    tool-patterns.md
  languages/ (load per-project)
  advanced/ (load on-demand)
    agents/
```

**Update CLAUDE.md:**
- Reference INDEX.md for navigation
- Remove 'load all references' patterns
- Add guidance on when to load specific refs

**Files to modify:**
- Create: INDEX.md
- Reorganize: reference/ directory structure
- Update: CLAUDE.md loading patterns

**Acceptance criteria:**
- Default context reduced from ~16,000 to ~2,000 lines
- All content still accessible when needed
- Clear guidance on what to load when
- ~13,000 tokens saved in typical sessions
